Topic.Title: 4.1 Problems - Direction Reformatted and Missing Objects

Posts.EditableText:
So I just tried to run some new 4.1 abilites, and when I ran the game, it broke everything.  So i put it back, and... it's still broke.

The directions north, south, etc. are now formatted at the top of the description, and the objects don't exist in the room as far as gameplay is concerned (even though they are there)  Any thoughts? Has this happened to others?
*edit*

apparently i didn't put everything back.  Had go back to "asl-version <400>"  that did the trick.
Posts.HTML:
So I just tried to run some new 4.1 abilites, and when I ran the game, it broke everything. So i put it back, and... it's still broke.

The directions north, south, etc. are now formatted at the top of the description, and the objects don't exist in the room as far as gameplay is concerned (even though they are there) Any thoughts? Has this happened to others?
*edit*

apparently i didn't put everything back. Had go back to "asl-version <400>" that did the trick.

Posts.EditableText: Objects don't exist in the room? Not sure what you mean there. Can you post some example ASL and output?
Posts.HTML: Objects don't exist in the room? Not sure what you mean there. Can you post some example ASL and output?

Posts.EditableText:
i'm sure the error must have been somewhere between the chair and the keyboard.

i had a decimal for some reason, saying 4.00 instead of 400 for asl version, and it made everything go hay wire! haha.
